# Repository Description & About

## Short Description (350 characters max for GitHub About)
Professional Revit Workstation Specification & Cost Analysis Tool - Interactive Streamlit application for analyzing and recommending Autodesk Revit 2022 workstation hardware configurations with performance benchmarks, component comparisons, and cost analysis.

## Topics/Tags
revit, autodesk, bim, workstation, hardware-analysis, performance-benchmarks, streamlit, data-visualization, cost-analysis, system-configuration, python, plotly, pandas, construction-technology, architecture

## Website
